DD0002:
There are physical facric and facric number, 
facric with complete cloth piece information.
DD0004: Scan and send your material image to your own email
DD0006:
The system will build within 3 minutes after uploading
Please go to the list of cloths to view
DD0008: Incomplete or no physical facric information.
DD0010: Place the back side Qrcode on top of the fabric for scanning, so that the system can detect the image as back side information.
DD0011: Please download the latest version of the form and fill out and upload the form according to its content to prevent formatting errors that the system cannot recognize.
DD0015: Auto item# or you can use your own
DD0018: Add keyword about this product so buyer can search for it. Ex: Weft Stratch, SS22, Spring, Summer, shirts, Quick Dry
DD0020: Add keyword about this product so your team can quickly find it. Ex: modified cross-section fiber, full dull, MOQ 3000Y
DD0027: Put more information on your material page: additional images, videos, care instructions or other content.
DD0031: Scan with Your own swatch or hanger
DD0032: If you do not have your own swatch card or there is no item no. on the card, please first Print A4 standard swatch with QR code and attach the fabric to the card or Print QR code label and attach it to the fabric.
DD0033: Your material has not been saved
DD0034: Do you want to save it before leaving?
DD0036: Mass upload: please download the excel template
DD0037: Mass update: please export excel from material assets, make changes offline, and then upload excel back to here
